name.sp: Capa del Día de San Patricio

description.en: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.ar: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.br: Um manto especial concedido a quem teve a sorte de encontrar um Trevo de Quatro Folhas! Aumenta a Velocidade de Movimento em 15%, o Acerto Crítico em 5% e a Velocidade de Conjuração em 5%.
description.cns: 为有幸找到四叶草的人颁发的特殊披风！使你的移动速度+15%，暴击率+5%，施法速度+5%。
description.de: Dieser Cloak erhöht deine Geschwindigkeit um 15%, Kritische Trefferrate um 5% und reduziert deine Cast Zeit um 5%.
description.fi: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.fil: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.fr: Le leprechaun m'a forcé ! Donne +15% en vitesse de déplacement, 5% en critique et 5% en vitesse d'incantation !
description.id: Cloak khusus diberikan kepada mereka yang cukup beruntung untuk menemukan Four-Leaf Clover! Meningkatkan Run Speed sebesar 15%, Critical Hit Chance sebesar 5%, dan mengurangi Casting Time sebesar 5%.
description.it: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.jp: 幸運にも四つ葉のクローバーを見つけた人に贈られる特別なマント！
description.kr: 운 좋게 네잎 클로버를 찾은 분들에게 수여되는 특별한 망토! 달리기 속도가 15% 증가하고 치명타 확률이 5% 증가하며 시전 시간이 5 % 감소합니다.
description.nl: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.pl: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.ru: Специальный плащ в награду нашедшему четырёхлистник!  Увеличивает скорость бега на 15%, шанс крита на 5%, уменьшает время каста на 5%.
description.sp: ¡Una capa especial otorgada a aquellos que tuvieron la suerte de encontrar un Trébol de Cuatro Hojas! Aumenta tu Velocidad de Movimiento en un 15%, la Probabilidad de Crítico en un 5% y reduce tu Tiempo de Lanzamiento un 5%.
description.sw: A special cloak awarded to those who were lucky enough to find a Four-Leaf Clover! Increases your Run Speed by 15%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and decreases your Casting Time by 5%.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมพิเศษมอบให้แก่ผู้ที่โชคดีพอที่จะพบ Four-Leaf Clover! เพิ่มความเร็วในการวิ่งของคุณ 15% โอกาสติดคริติคอล 5% และลดเวลาร่ายของคุณลง 5%
description.tw: 找到四葉幸運草的獎勵，移動速度+15%和爆擊機率+5%和施法速度縮短+5%
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng đặc biệt được trao cho những người may mắn tìm thấy Cỏ bốn lá! Tăng tốc độ chạy của bạn lên 15%, Cơ hội tấn công quan trọng lên 5% và giảm thời gian thi triển của bạn đi 5%
